item.title: Video Editor for Actress's Reel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor to help us edit a short 2-minute scene for an actress's reel. The scene needs to be polished and professionally edited to showcase the actress's talent and range. This is an important piece for her portfolio, so attention to detail and creativity are crucial. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing and a good eye for storytelling.

  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Ability to cut and trim footage to create a cohesive scene
  - Knowledge of color correction and audio editing
  - Understanding of pacing and storytelling techniques
  - Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

Budget: $25

Category: Acting
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Testimonial Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Testimonial Video

item.title: Experienced & Dynamic Voice Over Artist for YouTube Channel (Food Niche) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello and thank you for checking out our job posting!

We are a YouTube automation company and are starting a new channel in the FOOD niche. We are looking for an experienced, dynamic, dedicated voice over artist to join our team.

A couple of similar channels include:
https://www.youtube.com/@weirdhistoryfood/videos
https://www.youtube.com/@MashedFood/videos

This role will begin on a project basis but if we are a good fit then we will also eventually have a full-time/retainer opportunity. We are looking for long-term team players.

Please ONLY apply if you have experience doing engaging and dynamic voiceovers for kick-ass YouTube videos, commercials, or other relevant projects! ;)

Thanks and looking forward to hearing from you.

Hourly Range: $24.00-$65.00

Category: Voice Talent

item.title: Social Media Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Position Overview: We are seeking a talented Social Media Video Editor to join our marketing team. As a Video Editor, you will play a crucial role in producing compelling video content for various social media platforms. You will collaborate closely with our marketing team to conceptualize, edit, and deliver videos that effectively communicate our team message and engage our audience.
Responsibilities:
- Edit and assemble raw footage into a polished video product suitable for publishing on various social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, YouTube, etc.).
- Implement video edits, motion graphics, and visual effects to enhance video content.
- Ensure all edited videos align with firm guidelines and messaging.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to brainstorm and develop creative concepts for video content.
- Stay updated with industry trends and tools for video editing and implement best practices.
- Manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.
Requirements:
- Proven work experience as a video editor or similar role.
- Proficiency in video editing software
- Strong understanding of social media platforms and their video specifications.
- Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
- Excellent time management skills and attention to detail.
- A portfolio of previous video editing work is required.
Preferred Qualifications:
- Comprehensive experience in creating/editing video content specifically for social media platforms.
- Passion for creativity through video creation.
Benefits:
Competitive salary commensurate with experience.
Opportunities for professional development and growth within the company.
Collaborative and creative work environment with like-minded individuals.

How to Apply: Please send us a message. Include your resume, cover letter, and portfolio (or links to your work).


Posted On: June 26, 2024 19:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Promotional Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Social Media Video, TikTok Video, YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Video Production
Skills: Promotional Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Social Media Video, TikTok Video, YouTube Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello everyone

We are Content Solution agency based in Toronto Canada.

Looking for an editor long term. We have 4-7 videos to edit weekly.

Most of the clients are roofing companies, construction companies, realtors.

Please see the example of edits that we are looking for.

https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/7c9zjvrfi9r6bcrx6rvfg/AC_k2kUrJqtbTdLhHv6DLk4?rlkey=0ip4tr5tlhqjn2mavi337i5ib&st=59zjl2ki&dl=0

We definitely need more creative edits than just cuts and simple transitions. Any kind of sound effects, swooshes, clicks, claps etc would be appreciated.
So Please take your time to watch these videos above.

Our budget is $10 per video
Currently we have 5 videos that are needed to be edited, total budget for this week is $50.

Only candidates with a portfolio will be reviewed.

We DO NOT need a talking head video editor, please do not apply if you work with talking videos only.

These projects are time sensitive hence we will need them finished within 1-2 days of received raw videos from drones and cameras.

THank you!


Budget: $50
Posted On: June 26, 2024 19:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Poland
click to apply

item.title: Whiteboard or Doodly Video Composer for Substance Use Recovery Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to create engaging whiteboard or Doodly videos that are approximately 2-3 minutes in length. The videos will be focused on substance use recovery and will serve as educational tools for our audience. The ideal candidate should have experience in video composition and a understanding of how to bring our substance use recovery topics to life. Attention to detail and the ability to effectively communicate complex concepts visually are essential.

Skills required:
- Video composition
- Whiteboard or Doodly animation
- Attention to detail
- Effective visual communication
- Substance use recovery knowledge (is helpful, not required)

This is a medium-sized project that is expected to take 1 to 3 months to complete. Depending on how well the animation is received with our first few videos, we would be willing to extend this contract to something larger as we plan to expand nationally with our program and have a lot of topics to cover.

Expertise level: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $15.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 19:44 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Audio Editing, Audio Production, Video Editing, Whiteboard Animation
Skills: Video Production, Audio Editing, Audio Production, Video Editing, Whiteboard Animation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Talented Video Editor Needed for Marketing Agency - Upwork
item.description:
We are a marketing agency in need of a talented video editor who specializes in creating TikTok and Reels videos using stock photos, videos, and other resources. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of video editing techniques and trends for social media platforms. Attention to detail and creativity are essential for this role.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit and enhance TikTok and Reels videos to create engaging and eye-catching content
  - Utilize stock photos, videos, and other resources to enhance the videos
  - Ensure that the videos are in line with the brand's guidelines and target audience

  Requirements:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Experience in creating TikTok and Reels videos
  - Strong knowledge of current social media trends and best practices
  - Ability to work with tight deadlines and deliver high-quality work

  If you are a creative and skilled video editor with a passion for creating engaging content for social media, we would love to hear from you. Please provide examples of your previous work in your application.

Hourly Range: $7.00

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Graphic Design, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Graphic Design, Video Production

item.title: Record short 1-2 minute Screen-casting videos - Upwork
item.description:
If you have a good microphone and screen recording software, this might be something for you!

What we are doing:
We are an online education company and we create educational tutorial videos on YouTube about online problems.

Requirements:
- Decent microphone
- Screen recording software (OBS)
- Proficiency in english
- Bonus: voice over experience

Tasks:
1. Video creation
You will be recording video tutorials to online problems. Topics about online games and mobile apps are most common. (e.g. "How To Copy And Paste on Bluestacks", "How To Change Emotes in Brawl Stars", "How To Make GIF Stickers on Whatsapp iPhone").
Most videos are typically between 1-3 minutes long, can be recorded in one go and therefore don't require any editing.

Note: In the beginning stages we will introduce you to our systems but after a while you will become more efficient, since you will get to know each step of the process and you'll finish the tasks even quicker.


Payment
The payment is per video. We are looking for dedicated freelancers that can provide 4-5 videos per day. (28-35 videos per week) Recording 5 videos takes around 30 minutes using our systems. The payment per video is $1.25, which equals to $35.00 (28 videos) - $43.75 (35 videos) per week.

Note: Videos don't need to be recorded on a daily basis, you could finish all the work in the first 2 days of the week and be free for the rest of the week while still getting paid as agreed.


Get started
If you are interested in working together, DM me a short video sample that includes your human voice over and we will take things from there! (video sample can be about anything: e.g. "How to create a folder on pc")

Best regards
The TresoDigital Team

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 26, 2024 19:39 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Explainer Video, Screencasting Video, Voice-Over, Voice Acting
Skills: Video Production, Explainer Video, Screencasting Video, Voice-Over, Voice Acting
Country: Austria
click to apply

item.title: Instagram Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I need simple instagram videos edited. Then I will need Youtube videos edited int he future. The editing will consist of adding on top of the existing video, adding captions, and making appropriate cuts and splits to the video. The videos will usually be 30 seconds to one minute. The youtube videos in the future will be 8-10 minutes.

If you apply, please include examples of your work.

Hourly Range: $6.00-$12.00

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing

item.title: UGC Content Video Creator - Anime, K-Drama or Telenova lovers for Language Learning App - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented UGC content video creator to create engaging and educational videos for our language learning app. The app is Umi and we are focused on those who want to learn Japanese, Korean, French or Spanish. The ideal candidate should be be interested in Anime, KDrama or Telenova. The unique selling point for this app is that the app helps users learn by watching TV clips respectively to the language they are learning. For example, Japanese learning seekers watch Anime, Korean with K-Drama, etc. You will be responsible for filming, and editing high-quality videos. We will provide a general script and guidelines. We are looking for someone with a creative mindset, excellent communication skills, and a passion for language learning. If you are a self-motivated individual with a keen eye for detail and a knack for storytelling, we would love to hear from you.

Skills:
- Interested in learning either Spanish, Korean, Japanese, or French
- Strong understanding of the target language and culture
- Video production and editing skills
- Creative thinking and storytelling
- Excellent communication skills
- Self-motivated and detail-oriented

Budget: $100

item.title: Video Editor & Advertising Storyteller - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Video Editor & Advertising Storyteller

Location: Remote

About Our Company:
Clience is a dynamic marketing firm dedicated to crafting compelling narratives that resonate with audiences and drive engagement. We specialize in creating visually stunning and emotionally captivating video content for various advertising campaigns. We are looking for a creative and skilled Video Editor to join our team and help us continue to tell stories that not only entertain but also convert.

Job Description:
As a Video Editor at Clience, you will play a crucial role in shaping the visual storytelling of our client's brands. You will be responsible for editing raw video footage into polished pieces for advertising campaigns that are not only aesthetically appealing but also strategically aligned with marketing objectives.

Responsibilities:

- Collaborate with the creative team to conceptualize and execute video projects.
- Edit video footage to create compelling narratives that align with brand strategy.
- Implement dynamic editing techniques including cuts, transitions, sound design, and color grading to enhance the storytelling impact.
- Work closely with graphic designers and motion graphics artists to incorporate visual effects that enhance narrative elements.
- Ensure all videos meet quality standards and are delivered on schedule.
- Provide creative input on video content planning and scripting stages.

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a Video Editor with a strong portfolio showcasing storytelling through video ads.
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere - - Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
- Excellent sense of timing, pacing, and visual storytelling.
- Experience in color grading and sound design to enhance narrative video content.
- Strong communication skills and ability to work collaboratively with a creative team.
- Creative thinker with an eye for detail and a passion for storytelling.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 19:32 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Instagram Reels, Video Color Correction, Audio Editing, Video Transition, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Testimonial Video, Instagram Reels, Video Color Correction, Audio Editing, Video Transition, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Short Marketing Video Developer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an expert in developing short marketing videos for our product ie. https://voagents.ai/. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of effective video marketing strategies and be able to create engaging and compelling videos that capture the attention of our target audience. The videos will be used for promotional purposes across various online platforms.

    Responsibilities:
    - Develop short marketing videos to showcase the features and benefits of our product with respect to specific domain.
    - Collaborate with the marketing team to create video concepts and storyboards
    - Edit and enhance video footage to create a polished final product
    - Ensure videos align with our brand guidelines and maintain a consistent aesthetic

    Skills:
    - Video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
    - Strong storytelling and creative skills
    - Knowledge of video marketing best practices
    - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

We are looking for an expert-level video developer to deliver high-quality videos that effectively promote our product on TikTok, YouTube and Instagram

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 19:32 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Animation, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Animation, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Photoshop

item.title: Captivating Corporate Event Highlight Reel - Upwork
item.description:
I'm seeking a talented event videographer/editor to construct a 1-3 minute highlight reel of an upcoming corporate event. The finished product should weave together footage of keynote speaker segments, audience reactions and networking sessions, capturing the overall ambience of the day. The ideal freelancer for this project possesses:

- A knack for storytelling through visual content
- Prior experience with corporate videography
- Proficiency in editing software
- An understanding of corporate event dynamics
- A keen eye for identifying and capturing significant moments

This project requires a freelancer who can create a captivating narrative conveying the highlights and unique experiences of the event, within a concise, easy-to-share format

Hourly Range: $30.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 19:14 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography, Adobe Creative Suite

item.description:

This is a great opportunity to showcase your creativity and contribute to the growth of our channel.
